alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:57PM EDT until July 06 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON AND CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Homeville, or 10 miles southwest of Waverly, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Courtland and Sedley around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Dory, Berlin, Yale, Lumberton, Sebrell, Manry, Joyner, Worrell and Capron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
